title: Mrs Grey Rabbit
brief_description: The lives of common woodland and farm animals are depicted through the story of Mrs Grey Rabbit and her babies. We see animals like squirels, frogs, turtles and foxes as well as cows, dogs and chickens, what they look like and what they like to eat.
